title: Reverse Iteration in Python | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will need to implement a function that executes a given function for each element in a list, starting from the last element and working backwards.

meta.description: Learn how to execute a function for each element in a list, starting from the last one, using a Python function.
meta.keywords: coding challenge, python, reverse iteration, list, function
